title: How to Play 'Mary Had a Little Lamb' on a Phone

steps.headline: Find a phone that has dial tones.
Pick the phone up with your left hand, or right if it is more comfortable.
Use the opposite hand you picked the phone up with to hit the following numbers.

text:
Find a phone that has dial tones.  Pick the phone up with your left hand, or right if it is more comfortable.  Use the opposite hand you picked the phone up with to hit the following numbers. 6,5,4,5,6,6,6,5,5,5,6,9,9
6,5,4,5,6,6,6,6,5,5,6,5,4
sentences: Find a phone that has dial tones.
Pick the phone up with your left hand, or right if it is more comfortable.
Use the opposite hand you picked the phone up with to hit the following numbers.
